Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility System
Clinical Mass Spectrometry Identification and Differentiation System
Specimen Type(s): Isolated bacterial colonies grown on solid culture media
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Matrix-Assisted Laser Desorption/Ionization-Time Of Flight Mass Spectrometry (MALDI-TOF MS)
Methodologies: Automated sample preparation for MALDI-TOF MS
Automated preparation of microbial suspension for AST
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Copan WASP Colibrí System—an accessory for automating pre-analytical preparation of bacterial colonies for identification and antimicrobial susceptibility testing using MALDI-TOF MS and AST analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: Automates preparation of target slides and microbial suspensions from isolated bacterial colonies for use in conjunction with MALDI-TOF MS identification and VITEK 2 antimicrobial susceptibility testing systems to aid in the diagnosis of bacterial infections in clinical laboratories.
